start.commands:
\
if [ "$(id -u)" != "0" ]; then \
    printf "Launching Memcached on UNIX Socket
" >> SERVICE_LOG \
    SERVICE_ROOT/exports/memcached -s SERVICE_PREFIX/service.sock -P SERVICE_PID -d \
else \
    printf "Memcached can't be run as root!
" >> SERVICE_LOG \
    touch SERVICE_PREFIX/.stop \
fi \
